name: Cliff Flip Diving 2D: Swimming Simulator Full
name_original: Cliff Flip Diving 2D: Swimming Simulator Full
description:
Are you a passionate lover of xtreme sports games? Then our Cliff Flip Diving 2D: Swimming Simulator game is made exactly for you!
Enjoy this fantastic cliff jumping tournament! Perform different tricks and stunts without any guarding! Feel the real power of adrenaline! Plunge into the swimming pool from the highest springboard or hill ever and become a real pro athlete!
Sink into the warm water, create a wave performing back dive, half twist or straight position and have fun with Cliff Flip Diving 2D: Swimming Simulator!
Earn points for each successfully done mission and unlock new places for jumping, or buy new colorful skins for your diver! Would it be cute girl, geek in kigurumi or just pro athlete? This choice is up to you! Choose the cliff, jump from it and succeed at this fantastic contest!
Cliff Flip Diving 2D: Swimming Simulator features:
• Amazing springboard diving contest simulator
• Various interesting stunts to perform
• Many unlockable locations
• Wide range of colorful divers
Become a real sportsman with Cliff Flip Diving 2D: Swimming Simulator game! Perform tricks and stunts and have fun!
